title: Walmart general stores are coming to campsites nationwide; The opposite of superstores, The General Store by Walmart locations will be small retail shops serving guests at Getaway campsites
text:
Getaway builds collections of tiny cabins, called Outposts, in locations about two hours away from major cities. More "glamping" than camping, Getaway cabins have kitchens, toilets, and queen-size beds.

Founded in 2015, Getaway will have 28 locations by the end of 2022. Locations also include Moodus, Conn.; Running Springs, Calif.; Roscoe, N.Y.; and Osceola, Mo., which will all be opening a General Store by Walmart location through the end of the year.

Customers will also be able to sign up for a complimentary trial membership to Walmart+.

Walmart WMT stock has declined 12.5% for the year to date, while the Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA has lost 11.4%.

See: Walmart customers are spending on food, and not much else, as inflation takes a toll

Walmart general stores are coming to campsites nationwide
